text: Malafrena is a book by Ursula K. Le Guin that was published in 1979 . The novel takes place in the country of Orsinia, which is also the setting of Le Guin's 1976 story collection, Orsinian Tales. Category:1979 books Category:Books by Ursula K. Le Guin Category:20th-century American novels
title: Malafrena
